title: Mini-Ep 153: Raising the Bar
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 153: Raising the Bar
itunes:subtitle: Kate prepares for the approach of winter and Doree focuses on the things she can control. Plus, listeners call in with questions about toothbrush and legging cleanliness, facial cleanser bars, and the resurgence of chain letters. Activity o...
description:
Kate prepares for the approach of winter and Doree focuses on the things she can control. Plus, listeners call in with questions about toothbrush and legging cleanliness, facial cleanser bars, and the resurgence of chain letters. 


Activity of the Day: Continue taking deep breaths.


Follow us on Twitter and Instagram and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).

To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390.

You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

  • BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.
  • ULTA BEAUTY - See the joy this holiday season! Shop in store, curbside pickup or online at ulta.com.
  • CALM - For 40% off a Calm Premium subscription, head to calm.com/forever35.
  • GLOSSIER - For a limited time, new customers can get 10% off your first order at Glossier.com/podcast/FOREVER35. 
  • HELLOFRESH - Get $20 off your first four boxes when you go to hellofresh.com/forever80 and enter promo code FOREVER80.
  • Allure: The Science of Beauty Podcast - Listen to Allure: The Science of Beauty wherever you get your podcasts. New episodes every Thursday!


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
